name: X++ Source Code File
summary: Learn about .XPP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: X++ can be used for creating various types of ERP business programs, such as reports and logic that read and write Dynamics AX database information using the SQL syntax supported within X++.

description: Source code file written in X++, an object-oriented language developed by Microsoft for Microsoft Dynamic AX ERP (enterprise resource planning) software; uses syntax similar to the C# language; can be created and edited using MorphX, an IDE that is part of Microsoft Dynamics AX.
